content:
I have questions regards to DocumentReferance resources. I'm trying to add sicknote aside from other documents. What is the best way to do so?
Hopefully I'm on the right channel, otherwise, if you can redirect me I will be thankful

Your post https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179270-fhir.2Fdocuments/topic/help is probably a better location. (In general it's preferred to only ask a question in one place and to give a couple of business days before asking elsewhere unless someone explicitly suggests posting in a different stream.)
